00066     void change_part(AG_Event *event)
00067     {
00068         // get chosen body part
00069         BodyPart *body = static_cast<BodyPart*>(AG_PTR(1));
00070 
00071         // get state
00072         CharacterState *state = static_cast<CharacterState*>(AG_PTR(2));
00073 
00074         state->mChosen[body->getType()] = body->getId();
00075         state->updateAvatar(body);
00076     }
00077 
00078     void change_sex(AG_Event *event)
00079     {
00080         // get selected sex
00081         AG_Radio *sex = static_cast<AG_Radio*>(AG_SELF());
00082 
00083         // get state
00084         CharacterState *state = static_cast<CharacterState*>(AG_PTR(1));
00085 
00086         // get the body
00087         BodyPart *body;
00088         if (sex->value == 0)
00089         {
00090             body = resourceManager->getDefaultBody(PART_BODY);
00091         }
00092         else
00093         {
00094             body = resourceManager->getFemaleBody();
00095         }
00096 
00097         state->mChosen[body->getType()] = body->getId();
00098         state->updateAvatar(body);
00099     }
00100 
00101     void radio_selected(AG_Event *event)
00102     {
00103         AG_Button *button = static_cast<AG_Button*>(AG_PTR(1));
00104         if (button)
00105             AG_WidgetEnable(button);
00106         AG_Button *del_button = static_cast<AG_Button*>(AG_PTR(2));
00107         if (del_button)
00108             AG_WidgetEnable(del_button);
00109     }

00111     void select_character(AG_Event *event)
00112     {
00113         AG_Radio *selected = static_cast<AG_Radio*>(AG_PTR(1));
00114         if (selected)
00115         {
00116             Packet *packet = new Packet(PAMSG_CHAR_CHOOSE);
00117             // send the slot of character selected
00118             int slot = selected->value;
00119             packet->setInteger(slot);
00120             player->setCharacter(slot);
00121 
00122             networkManager->sendPacket(packet);
00123 
00124                         interfaceManager->setErrorMessage("");
00125                         interfaceManager->showErrorWindow(false);
00126         }
00127         else
00128         {
00129                         interfaceManager->setErrorMessage("Invalid character chosen");
00130             interfaceManager->showErrorWindow(true);
00131         }
00132     }
00133 
00134     void del_character(AG_Event *event)
00135     {
00136         AG_Radio *selected = static_cast<AG_Radio*>(AG_PTR(1));
00137         if (selected)
00138         {
00139             // send the slot of character selected
00140             int slot = selected->value;
00141 
00142             Packet *packet = new Packet(PAMSG_CHAR_DELETE);
00143             packet->setInteger(slot);
00144 
00145             networkManager->sendPacket(packet);
00146 
00147                         interfaceManager->setErrorMessage("");
00148                         interfaceManager->showErrorWindow(false);
00149         }
00150         else
00151         {
00152                         interfaceManager->setErrorMessage("Invalid character chosen");
00153             interfaceManager->showErrorWindow(true);
00154         }
00155     }

00157     void switch_char_window(AG_Event *event)
00158     {
00159         AG_Window *one = static_cast<AG_Window*>(AG_PTR(1));
00160         if (one)
00161             AG_WindowHide(one);
00162 
00163         AG_Window *two = static_cast<AG_Window*>(AG_PTR(2));
00164         if (two)
00165             AG_WindowShow(two);
00166     }
00167 
00168     void submit_new(AG_Event *event)
00169     {
00170         CharacterState *state = static_cast<CharacterState*>(AG_PTR(2));
00171 
00172         std::string name = AG_TextboxDupString(static_cast<AG_Textbox*>(AG_PTR(1)));
00173         if (!name.empty() && state)
00174         {
00175             int body = state->mChosen[PART_BODY];
00176                         int hair = state->mChosen[PART_HAIR];
00177 
00178             Packet *packet = new Packet(PAMSG_CHAR_CREATE);
00179             packet->setString(name);
00180             packet->setInteger(body);
00181             packet->setInteger(hair);
00182             networkManager->sendPacket(packet);
00183 
00184             interfaceManager->setErrorMessage("");
00185                         interfaceManager->showErrorWindow(false);
00186         }
00187         else
00188         {
00189             interfaceManager->setErrorMessage("Invalid character name");
00190             interfaceManager->showErrorWindow(true);
00191         }
00192     }
00193 
00194     CharacterState::CharacterState()
00195     {
00196                 mSelected = 0;
00197                 mAvatar = 0;
00198 
00199                 resourceManager->loadBodyParts("body.cfg");
00200         resourceManager->loadAnimations("animation.cfg");
00201 
00202                 BodyPart *body = resourceManager->getDefaultBody(PART_BODY);
00203                 BodyPart *hair = resourceManager->getDefaultBody(PART_HAIR);
00204                 if (body)
00205             mChosen.push_back(body->getId());
00206         if (hair)
00207                 mChosen.push_back(hair->getId());
00208     }
00209 
00210     void CharacterState::enter()
00211     {
00212         // When we enter character state
00213         // player should already contain a list
00214         // of existing characters from the game server
00215         int screenWidth = graphicsEngine->getScreenWidth();
00216                 int screenHeight = graphicsEngine->getScreenHeight();
00217                 mHalfScreenWidth = screenWidth / 2;
00218                 mHalfScreenHeight = screenHeight / 2;
00219 
00220                 AG_Window *win = AG_WindowNew(AG_WINDOW_PLAIN|AG_WINDOW_KEEPBELOW);
00221                 AG_WindowShow(win);
00222                 AG_WindowMaximize(win);
00223                 interfaceManager->addWindow(win);
00224 
00225                 mSelectWindow = AG_WindowNewNamed(AG_WINDOW_NOBUTTONS|AG_WINDOW_KEEPABOVE, "CharSelect");
00226                 mCreateWindow = AG_WindowNewNamed(AG_WINDOW_NOBUTTONS|AG_WINDOW_KEEPABOVE, "CharNew");
00227 
00228                 createSelectionWindow();
00229                 createCreationWindow();
00230     }
00231 
00232     void CharacterState::exit()
00233     {
00234         interfaceManager->removeAllWindows();
00235         delete mAvatar;
00236         mAvatar = 0;
00237     }
00238 
00239     bool CharacterState::update()
00240     {
00241         // Check for input, if escape pressed, exit
00242                 if (inputManager->getKey(SDLK_ESCAPE))
00243                 {
00244                         return false;
00245                 }
00246 
00247         SDL_Delay(0);
00248 
00249         return true;
00250     }

00252     void CharacterState::createSelectionWindow()
00253     {
00254         AG_WindowSetCaption(mSelectWindow, "Select Character");
00255                 AG_WindowSetSpacing(mSelectWindow, 5);
00256                 AG_WindowSetGeometry(mSelectWindow, mHalfScreenWidth - 100, mHalfScreenHeight - 115, 200, 230);
00257 
00258         AG_VBox *selectBox = AG_VBoxNew(mSelectWindow, 0);
00259         AG_Radio *selection = AG_RadioNew(selectBox, 0, NULL);
00260                 AG_Fixed *position = AG_FixedNew(selectBox, 0);
00261 
00262                 // create number of characters based on number of characters a player has
00263         for (int i = 0; i < player->getNumChars(); ++i)
00264         {
00265             Character *c = player->getCharacter(i);
00266             if (c)
00267             {
00268                 AG_Pixmap *pixmap = NULL;
00269 
00270                                 // load the texture
00271                 Texture *tex = c->getTexture();
00272 
00273                 if (tex)
00274                 {
00275                     // put the texture into the pixmap
00276                     AG_Surface *surface = NULL;
00277                     if (graphicsEngine->isOpenGL())
00278                     {
00279                                                 surface = graphicsEngine->createSurface(tex->getGLTexture(), 64, 128);
00280                                                 pixmap = AG_PixmapFromSurface(NULL, AG_PIXMAP_RESCALE, surface);
00281                     }
00282                     else
00283                     {
00284                         surface = AG_SurfaceFromSDL(tex->getSDLSurface());
00285                         pixmap = AG_PixmapFromSurface(0, AG_PIXMAP_RESCALE, surface);
00286                     }
00287 
00288                     // put the pixmap on the screen
00289                     AG_FixedPut(position, pixmap, 2 + (64 * i), 0);
00290                 }
00291 
00292                 // Allow user to select the character
00293                 AG_RadioAddItem(selection, "%s - Level %i", c->getName().c_str(), c->getLevel());
00294                         }
00295                 }
00296                 AG_Expand(position);
00297                 AG_Expand(selectBox);
00298 
00299                 AG_HBox *box = AG_HBoxNew(mSelectWindow, 0);
00300                 AG_ObjectSetName(box, "Container");
00301                 AG_Button *button = AG_ButtonNewFn(box, 0, "Choose", select_character, "%p", selection);
00302                 AG_ButtonJustify(button, AG_TEXT_CENTER);
00303                 AG_Button *create_button = AG_ButtonNewFn(box, 0, "Create New",
00304                                                   switch_char_window, "%p%p",
00305                                                   mSelectWindow, mCreateWindow);
00306                 AG_ButtonJustify(create_button, AG_TEXT_CENTER);
00307         AG_Button *delete_button = AG_ButtonNewFn(box, 0, "Delete", del_character, "%p", selection);
00308         AG_ButtonJustify(delete_button, AG_TEXT_CENTER);
00309                 AG_WidgetDisable(button);
00310         AG_WidgetDisable(delete_button);
00311 
00312                 AG_SetEvent(selection, "radio-changed", radio_selected, "%p%p", button, delete_button);
00313 
00314                 AG_WindowShow(mSelectWindow);
00315                 interfaceManager->addWindow(mSelectWindow);
00316     }
00317 
00318     void CharacterState::createCreationWindow()
00319     {
00320         // set window paramaters
00321         AG_WindowSetCaption(mCreateWindow, "Create new Character");
00322                 AG_WindowSetSpacing(mCreateWindow, 12);
00323                 AG_WindowSetGeometry(mCreateWindow, mHalfScreenWidth - 140, mHalfScreenHeight - 150, 280, 300);
00324 
00325         // create layout
00326                 AG_HBox *charBox = AG_HBoxNew(mCreateWindow, 0);
00327                 AG_Fixed *charPos = AG_FixedNew(charBox, 0);
00328 
00329         // build default avatar
00330         mAvatar = new Avatar;
00331         createAvatar();
00332         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mAvatar->bodyparts.size(); ++i)
00333         {
00334             AG_FixedPut(charPos, mAvatar->bodyparts[i], 10, 10);
00335         }
00336 
00337         AG_Expand(charBox);
00338         AG_Expand(charPos);
00339 
00340         // list all the hair styles to choose from
00341         std::vector<BodyPart*> hairList = resourceManager->getBodyList(PART_HAIR);
00342         int hairCount = hairList.size();
00343         for (int i = 0; i < hairCount; ++i)
00344         {
00345             // get the body
00346             BodyPart *body = hairList[i];
00347 
00348             if (!body)
00349             {
00350                 // error
00351                 break;
00352             }
00353             // load the texture
00354             Texture *tex = body->getIcon();
00355 
00356             AG_Button *hair = AG_ButtonNewFn(charBox, 0, 0, change_part, "%p%p", body, this);
00357             AG_ButtonJustify(hair, AG_TEXT_CENTER);
00358             AG_ButtonValign(hair, AG_TEXT_MIDDLE);
00359 
00360             // make each haair style into a button with hair style icon
00361             AG_Surface *surface = NULL;
00362             if (graphicsEngine->isOpenGL())
00363             {
00364                                 surface = graphicsEngine->createSurface(tex->getGLTexture(), tex->getWidth(),
00365                                                                                                                 tex->getHeight());
00366             }
00367             else
00368             {
00369                 surface = AG_SurfaceFromSDL(tex->getSDLSurface());
00370             }
00371             AG_ButtonSurface(hair, surface);
00372         }
00373 
00374         AG_Radio *sex = AG_RadioNewFn(mCreateWindow, 0, NULL, change_sex, "%p", this);
00375         AG_RadioAddItem(sex, "male");
00376         AG_RadioAddItem(sex, "female");
00377 
00378                 AG_Textbox *charNick = AG_TextboxNew(mCreateWindow, 0, "Nickname: ");
00379                 AG_TextboxSizeHint(charNick, "XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX");
00380 
00381                 AG_HBox *hbox = AG_HBoxNew(mCreateWindow, 0);
00382                 AG_Button *backButton = AG_ButtonNewFn(hbox, 0, "Cancel", switch_char_window, "%p%p",
00383                                                 mCreateWindow, mSelectWindow);
00384                 AG_ButtonJustify(backButton, AG_TEXT_CENTER);
00385                 AG_Button *button = AG_ButtonNewFn(hbox, 0, "Create", submit_new, "%p%p", charNick, this);
00386                 AG_ButtonJustify(button, AG_TEXT_CENTER);
00387 
00388                 interfaceManager->addWindow(mCreateWindow);
00389     }
00390 
00391     void CharacterState::createAvatar()
00392     {
00393         for (int i = 0; i < 2; ++i)
00394         {
00395             // load the texture
00396             BodyPart *body = resourceManager->getDefaultBody(i);
00397             if (!body)
00398                 break;
00399             Texture *tex = body->getTexture();
00400 
00401             // put the texture into the pixmap
00402             if (graphicsEngine->isOpenGL())
00403             {
00404                                 AG_Surface *s = graphicsEngine->createSurface(tex->getGLTexture(), 64, 128);
00405                 mAvatar->bodyparts.push_back(AG_PixmapFromSurface(0, AG_PIXMAP_RESCALE, s));
00406             }
00407             else
00408             {
00409                 AG_Surface *s = AG_SurfaceFromSDL(tex->getSDLSurface());
00410                 mAvatar->bodyparts.push_back(AG_PixmapFromSurface(0, AG_PIXMAP_RESCALE, s));
00411             }
00412         }
00413     }
00414 
00415     void CharacterState::updateAvatar(BodyPart *body)
00416     {
00417         // load the new graphic
00418         Texture *tex = body->getTexture();
00419 
00420         AG_Pixmap *pixmap = mAvatar->bodyparts.at(body->getType());
00421 
00422         AG_Surface *surface = NULL;
00423 
00424         if (graphicsEngine->isOpenGL())
00425         {
00426             surface = graphicsEngine->createSurface(tex->getGLTexture(), 64, 128);
00427         }
00428         else
00429         {
00430             surface = AG_SurfaceFromSDL(tex->getSDLSurface());
00431         }
00432 
00433         AG_PixmapReplaceCurrentSurface(pixmap, surface);
00434         AG_WindowUpdate(mCreateWindow);
00435     }
